幈字的基本解释

幈
píng
古同“屏”：“云影湖光淡无际，锦幈围。”

幈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［píng］
［《廣韻》薄經切，平青，並。］
“屛1”的新字形。亦作“幈1”。
(1)照壁。对着门的小墙。
(2)屏风。
(3)屏障之物。
(4)成组的条幅。
(5)指类似画屏的东西。
(6)星座名。即内屏。共四星。
[②]［bǐng］
［《廣韻》必郢切，上静，幫。］
“併2”的被通假字。“偋2”的被通假字。“屛2”的新字形。“并2”的被通假字。
(1)隐藏。
(2)掩蔽。
(3)退避；隐退。
(4)使退避。
(5)放逐；摈弃。
(6)捍蔽；保护。
(7)犹抑制。
(8)通“辨”。参见“屏2言”。
[③]［bīng］
［《廣韻》府盈切，平清，幫。］
“屛3”的新字形。
见“屏3營”。
[④]［bìng］
［《集韻》步定切，去徑，並。］
［《集韻》卑正切，去勁，並。］
“屛4”的新字形。亦作“庰1”。
见“屏4當”、“屏4廁”。

幈字的康熙字典解释

【補遺】【寅集】【巾字部】　幈； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页334第29
【字彙補】與屏同。【邵堯夫·幈幛春吟詞】幈幛山下有家園，每歲家園過禁煙。

幈字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
幈字的起名意思

遮挡，遮挡物；字画的条幅。

幈
Basic explanation of words
幈
píng
Gu Tong's "Screen": "The clouds and shadows of the lake are endless, and the scenery surrounds them."
幈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［píng］
["Guangyun" thin classic cut, flat green, combined. ]
The new glyph of "屛1". Also known as "幈1".
(1) According to the wall. The small wall facing the door.
(2) Screens.
(3) The thing of the barrier.
(4) Grouped banners.
(5) Refers to something similar to a picture screen.
(6) Constellation name. That is, the inner screen. A total of four stars.
[②]［bǐng］
["Guangyun" must be cut, quiet, help. ]
The word "bin 2" was passed falsely. "偋2" was passed falsely. The new glyph of "屛2". The word "bin 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Hide.
(2) Masking.
(3) Retreat; retreat.
(4) Retreat.
(5) Exile; abandon.
(6) Defend; protect.
(7) Still inhibited.
(8) Through "discrimination". See "Screen 2 words".
[③]［bīng］
["Guangyun" Fu Yingqie, Pingqing, help. ]
The new glyph of "屛3".
See "Ping 3 Camp".
[④]［bìng］
["Ji Yun" step by step, go to the path, and merge. ]
["Ji Yun" humble tangent, go vigorous, and. ]
The new glyph of "屛4". Also known as "庰1".
See "Screen 4 Dang", "Screen 4 Toilet".
幈
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Addendum] [Yin Ji] [Scarf Character Department] 　幈; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 334 29
【Word Supplement】Same as the screen. [Shao Yaofu·The Songs of the Spring Songs] There are homes under the mountains, and every year the homes are non-smoking.
幈

Korean Ming Dynasty
幈
Name meaning
Blocking, blocking objects; scrolls of calligraphy and painting.
píng
вм. 屏 píng (в собственных именах)
